SELECT faqno, adminno, faqtitle, faqcontent, faqrdate, faqword, aid, r FROM ( SELECT faqno, adminno, faqtitle, faqcontent, faqrdate, faqword, aid, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT f.faqno, a.adminno, f.faqtitle, f.faqcontent, f.faqrdate, f.faqword, a.adminid as aid FROM faq f, admin a
WHERE f.adminno = a.adminno
WHERE f.adminno = a.adminno AND (faqtitle LIKE '%' || #{faqword} || '%' OR faqcontent LIKE '%' || #{faqword} || '%' OR faqword LIKE '%' || #{faqword} || '%')
ORDER BY faqno DESC, faqtitle ASC ) ) WHERE r >= #{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
